requests.name: 01 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/event
requests.description: Add a new event (with its associated readings).

requests.name: 90 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/valuedescriptor/label/:label
requests.description: Return ValueDescriptor objects with given label. ServcieException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.

requests.name: 100 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/event/device/:deviceId
requests.description: Delete all events (and their readings) associated to a device given the device's id (either database generated id or name). ServiceException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.   NotFoundException (HTTP 404) if the meta data checks are on and no device is found for supplied id.

requests.name: 04 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/event
requests.description: Update the event data (not including updating the readings). NotFoundException (HTTP 404) if the event cannot be found by id. ServcieException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.

requests.name: 35 reading can be added without checking the matching value descriptor
requests.description: Given a reading is associated to a non-existent value descriptor 'co21', and configuration file sets ValidateCheck = false ;when use api post this reading ; then the reading object can be updated with the returned status code 200.

requests.name: 59 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/reading/label/:label/{limit}
requests.description: Return a list of readings with an associated value descriptor of the label specified. LimitExceededException (HTTP 413) if the number of readings exceeds the current max limit. ServiceException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.

requests.name: 94 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/event/device/:deviceId/{limit}
requests.description: Return list of events with their associated readings for a given device, sort by event creation date. May be an empty list if none are associated to the device.  Note: does not yet handle device managers. LimitExceededException (HTTP 413) if the number of events exceeds the current max limit. ServcieException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.  NotFoundException (HTTP 404) if the meta data checks are on and no device is found for supplied id.

requests.name: 02 The event that device field is device id , which can be added without checking the matching value descriptor in reading
requests.description: Given a new event (with its associated readings),and device field is device id,and a reading is associated to a non-existent value descriptor 'xxx', and configuration file sets ValidateCheck = false ;when use api post this event ; then the event object can be created with the returned status code 200.

requests.name: 33 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/event/scrub
requests.description: Remove all pushed events and their associated readings.ServiceException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.  Should only be used by the scrubber micro service

requests.name: 67 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/reading/:start/{end}/{limit}
requests.description: Return a list of readings between two timestamps - limited by the number specified in the limit parameter. LimitExceededException (HTTP 413) if the number of readings exceeds the current max limit. ServiceException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.

requests.name: 77 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/valuedescriptor/id/:id
requests.description: Remove the ValueDescriptor designated by database generated identifier. ServcieException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues. DataValidationException (HTTP 409) if the value descriptor is still referenced in Readings. NotFoundException (404) if the value descriptor cannot be located by the identifier.

requests.name: 58 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/reading/uomlabel/:uomLabel/{limit}
requests.description: Return a list of readings with an associated value descriptor of the UoM label specified. LimitExceededException (HTTP 413) if the number of readings exceeds the current max limit. ServiceException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.

requests.name: 104 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/valuedescriptor 409
requests.description: Add a new ValueDescriptor whose name must be unique. ServcieException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues. DataValidationException (HTTP 409) try to add ValueDescriptor which already exists in database.

requests.name: 34 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/reading
requests.description: Add a new reading. ServiceException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues. DataValidationException (HTTP 409) if the associated value descriptor is non-existent.

requests.name: 65 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/reading/:start/{end}/{limit}
requests.description: Return a list of readings between two timestamps - limited by the number specified in the limit parameter. LimitExceededException (HTTP 413) if the number of readings exceeds the current max limit. ServiceException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.

requests.name: 61 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/reading/label/:label/{limit}
requests.description: Return a list of readings with an associated value descriptor of the label specified. LimitExceededException (HTTP 413) if the number of readings exceeds the current max limit. ServiceException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.

requests.name: 05 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/event
requests.description: Update the event data (not including updating the readings). NotFoundException (HTTP 404) if the event cannot be found by id. ServcieException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.

requests.description: Retrieve a reading by its database generated id.  ServiceException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues

requests.name: 09 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/event
requests.description: Fetch all events with their associated readings. LimitExceededException (HTTP 413) if the number of events exceeds the current max limit. ServcieException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.

requests.name: 37 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/reading
requests.description: Update the reading.  Reading object needs to contain the database generated id of the existing reading. NotFoundException (HTTP 404) if the reading cannot be found by id. ServiceException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues. DataValidationException if the associated value descriptor is non-existent.

requests.name: 24 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/event/:start/{end}/{limit}
requests.description: Return all events between a given begin and end date/time (in the form of longs). LimitExceededException (HTTP 413) if the number of events exceeds the current max limit. ServiceException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.

requests.name: 55 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/reading/name/:name/{limit}
requests.description: Return a list of readings that are associated to a ValueDescripter by name. LimitExceededException (HTTP 413) if the number of readings exceeds the current max limit. ServiceException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.

requests.name: 48 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/reading/id/:id
requests.description: Delete the reading from persistent storage. NotFoundException (HTTP 404) if the reading cannot be found by id. ServiceException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.

requests.name: 13 http://localhost:48080/api/v1/event/id/:id
requests.description: Delete an event and all its readings given its database generated id. NotFoundException (HTTP 404) if the event cannot be found by id. ServcieException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues.
